name: WEMIX
introduce: WEMIX is Blockchain Gaming Platform developed by WEMIX Pte. Ltd, providing services including Cryptocurrency Wallet, Token Decentralized Exchange, NFT Item Marketplace, WEMIX Staking and the Game Gateway. WEMIX Pte. Ltd is a Blockchain business dept. of Wemade, the Developer and Owner of “The Legend of Mir” IP, successful game with over 500 Million users.
